name: Roulette Special
desc: Colorful drinks. It might be more accurate to call this a table game than nourishment of any sort, one where the rules are to drink whatever drink the pointer falls on. Demyan has modified the drinks to differ from The Flagship's usual offerings â€” all of them are alcohol-free and rather sweet.

value.text: Decreases all party members' climbing and sprinting Stamina consumption by 20% for 900s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
